meanings.definition: Fitting very closely to the body
meanings.sent1: She wore skintight jeans that hugged her legs.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's skintight costume showed off every muscle.
meanings.sent3: The skintight gloves made it hard for him to pick up tiny objects.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was skintight, waiting for the results.
meanings.sent5: The memory was skintight in his mind, never fading.

meanings.sent2: He bought a skintight dress for the special occasion.
